content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price is €700 per month. I am sure you will find the location of the apartment quite convenient, but as agreed, we will only discuss the rental price here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, I will make an offer. I am willing to pay €600 per month. I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is too low. I am looking for a higher price to rent out my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about €650? It is a good middle ground between my offer and your initial price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is still too low. I am looking for a higher price to rent out my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about €680? I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
